tasks.title: Complete GitHub Actions CI/CD Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the complete CI/CD pipeline with worker deployment, testing, and monitoring
tasks.details:
The complete CI/CD infrastructure has been successfully implemented with comprehensive GitHub Actions workflows in `.github/workflows/`. All core testing and quality automation is now operational:

 COMPLETED CI/CD WORKFLOWS:
- **ci.yml**: Comprehensive test, typecheck, lint, security, build, and quality-gate jobs
- **coverage.yml**: Test coverage automation and reporting
- **test.yml**: Unit and integration tests with Node 18 & 20 matrix
- **lint.yml**: Code quality enforcement (ESLint, Prettier, Markdown, Terraform, Wrangler validation)
- **codeql.yml**: Security scanning and vulnerability detection with weekly automation
- **pr-check.yml**: PR validation with semantic titles, bundle size monitoring, performance checks
- **auto-merge.yml**: Automated merge for PRs labeled 'automerge'
- **labeler.yml**: Automated PR labeling based on changed files

 DEPLOYMENT WORKFLOWS (Ready for Worker):
- **deploy-worker.yml**: Staging and production deployment with Cloudflare Wrangler
- **release.yml**: Automated version management and release deployment

The CI/CD automation framework provides complete testing infrastructure, security scanning, code quality enforcement, and deployment pipelines. Worker-specific deployment functionality is implemented but requires actual Worker deployment to activate and test.
